Plot: Precious Ramotswe has only just set up shop as Botswana's No.1 (and only) lady detective when she is hired to track down a missing husband, uncover a con man, and follow a wayward daughter. However, the case that tugs at her heart, and lands her in danger, is a missing eleven-year-old boy, who may have been snatched by witch doctors.
Characters: Precious Ramotswe, Silvia Potokwani, Charlie the older apprentice, Note Mokoti, Mr. J.L.B. Matekoni, Violet Sepotho, Grace Makutsi, Fanwell the younger apprentice, Obed Ramotswe
Setting: Botswana, Johannesburg (South Africa), Mafikeng (South Africa), Gaborone (Botswana) Mochudi (Botswana), Gaborone (Botswana), Mochudi (Botswana)
